column6: Great deal. Better than going to the store and ...
column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2016
column14: Great deal. Better than going to the store and buying it. It's definitely easy in the skin, face and hair too. The only thing that can be rather wasteful is the think gelatinous consistency of the product. I'm not one to use the shower puff balls to bathe and it seems like that's what it's intended for... A little bit goes a long way, even with my hard water!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2019
column14: It smells nice and fresh and is very easy to use compared to a bar of soap. It can last me up to around 2 months when used normally and is my favorite soap to use so far!

column6: Irish Spring Moisture Blast Body Wash
column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2016
column14: Irish Spring Moisture Blast Body Wash, is a notch off from the standard "green" body wash.  It has a fresher scent, and is loaded with moisturizers.  For the price, can not be beat.
